desc: Mary Caryl Designs is a fashion apparel brand for pole dancing, yoga, Pilates, and fitness. Designed for maximum comfort, these quality sports bras, booty shorts, leggings, and more will make you look gorgeous at the dance studio, gym, or just hanging out with friends.

layout.text: Flattering and feminine fitness wear for timeless beauties. Classy & contemporary clothes for everyday! Pole & Yoga fitness wear. Skin Care & Makeup.
